public Instagram\Http\Response
# search( integer $latitude, integer $longitude, integer $distance = 1000 )

Search for a location by geographic coordinate.

Search for a location by geographic coordinate.

Parameters

$latitude
Latitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lng is required
$longitude
Longitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lat is required
$distance
The distance in metres. Default is 1000m (distance=1000), max distance is 5km.

Returns

Instagram\Http\Response

Link

https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/locations/#get_locations_search
